name: Taz
summary: Taz is a video game developed and released by Atari, Inc. in 1983 for the Atari 2600. It features the Looney Tunes character the Tasmanian Devil in a food frenzy. Within the game, Taz only appears as a tornado. The same game was released outside the United States as Asterix, with the character Asterix instead of Taz.
info:
• 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 平台: Atari 2600
  • 游戏类型: ACT
